item.title: Roles Page Down for Customers
item.content:encoded:
[Medium] - 'Page Not Found' Error on Roles Page

Summary: An issue has been identified causing a 'page not found' error on the Roles Page for customers. The team is currently working on a fix.

Feb 22, 12:51 PST
Identified - An issue is causing a 'page not found' error on the Roles Page for customers has been identified. The team is working on a fix and will provide an update ASAP.

item.title: New Okta Connection Fails During Setup
item.content:encoded:
[High] - Okta Integration Failure Summary: A recent update from Okta has caused new integrations to fail. The issue is related to a default feature in the update. Unchecking the requirement in the application's configuration resolves the integration flow problem.

Feb 20, 16:21 PST
Identified - This issue appears to be related to a recent update from Okta adding Demonstrating Proof of Possession (DPop) to new applications by default. We do not meet this burden currently. Unchecking this requirement in the configuration of the application allows us to successfully go through the integration flow

Feb 20, 14:27 PST
Investigating - We have identified an issue causing new Okta integrations to fail during the initial setup. Our team is looking into this now and will provide updates when available.

Those with existing Okta integrations connected should not be impacted

item.title: Magic Login Links and other emails may be delayed or not arrive to the inbox.
item.content:encoded:
Feb 19, 10:58 PST
Resolved - The issue with delayed emails has been resolved and should now be delivered again. Previously requested emails should also be delivered from the queue.

Feb 19, 10:23 PST
Update - We are continuing to investigate this issue.

Feb 19, 10:21 PST
Investigating - We are currently investigating an issue in which Magic Login Links & other emails are delayed or do not make it to the users inbox. It is currently recommended to log in with SSO if available.

item.title: Expired magic links due to preemptive email scanning
item.content:encoded:
Feb 16, 09:42 PST
Resolved - After updating our login process, we've noticed more users successfully logging in through login links, effectively resolving the previous issue. Should you continue to encounter any problems with email login, please contact our Support team at support@vanta.com.

Feb 15, 07:47 PST
Monitoring - We've released an update to our login flow that prevents email scanning tools from consuming our login links. We're actively monitoring this situation. If you continue to see any issues logging in with email, please contact our Support team at support@vanta.com.

Feb 13, 16:44 PST
Identified - We've detected an increase in expired magic links, which appear to be caused by email security scanners. These scanners, integrated into email servers, preemptively access message links to check for malicious content. Our magic links are designed for one-time access and are consumed by these scanners before the intended recipient can use them. We're currently working on adjusting this behavior. In the meantime, we recommend discussing this issue with your IT team or opting for Single Sign-On (SSO) as an alternative. Please access Vanta's help center for instructions on integrating SSO: https://help.vanta.com/hc/en-us/sections/9623445054740-Identity-Providers

item.title: Subset of Vendor page related tests incorrectly showing "Needs attention"
item.content:encoded:
Feb 13, 10:00 PST
Resolved - This issue should now be resolved. Test history has also been corrected and invalidated for the duration of this incident.

Feb 13, 00:27 PST
Monitoring - The team has deployed a fix to resolve tests incorrectly showing "Needs attention" for the following tests:

- Company has Data Processing Agreements (DPA) with vendors processing customer data
- Company has CCPA Service Provider Contracts with vendors processing customer data
- Company has Business Associate Agreements (BAA) with vendors processing ePHI

We're continuing to monitor to ensure this situation is resolved.

Feb 12, 15:53 PST
Update - The team is continuing to work on resolving the issue. Test history has accidentally been marked as invalid from 2023-2024 for these tests, however, this will be resolved as soon as possible.

Feb 12, 13:21 PST
Identified - We have identified an issue where tests are incorrectly showing "Needs attention" affecting the following tests:

- Company has Data Processing Agreements (DPA) with vendors processing customer data
- Company has CCPA Service Provider Contracts with vendors processing customer data
- Company has Business Associate Agreements (BAA) with vendors processing ePHI

Our team has identified the issue and is working on a fix, we will provide an update as soon as possible.

item.title: Issues Fetching Updates from KnowBe4
item.content:encoded:
Feb 10, 06:30 PST
Resolved - This issue has been resolved.

Feb 9, 10:15 PST
Investigating - We're experiencing a vendor outage and cannot pull in Security Training updates for KnowBe4 currently. The team is investigating and will post updates when available.

item.title: Delays in Vanta Agent Updates
item.content:encoded:
Feb 9, 17:59 PST
Resolved - This issue has been resolved.

Feb 9, 16:18 PST
Identified - Our team is working on implementing a fix and will continue to monitor.

Feb 9, 15:57 PST
Investigating - We have identified an issue that appears to be causing a delay in some Agent data updates. We will provide updates as they become available.

item.title: Issues with 1Password Data Fetch
item.content:encoded:
Feb 7, 15:36 PST
Resolved - 1Password integration functionality is restored.

Feb 7, 13:19 PST
Investigating - We have identified an issue affecting 1Password integrations within Vanta that is currently preventing updates or integration reconnections.

Our team is investigating the root cause and will provide an update as soon as possible.

item.title: Questionnaire Automation is unavailable for all customers and Trust Centers are unavailable for some customers.
item.content:encoded:
Feb 5, 13:19 PST
Resolved - This incident has been resolved, and both Questionnaire Automation and Trust Centers should be functioning as expected.

item.title: Questionnaire Automation is unavailable for all customers and Trust Centers are unavailable for some customers.
item.content:encoded:
Feb 5, 04:13 PST
Resolved - This incident has been resolved, and both Questionnaire Automation and Trust Centers should be functioning as expected.

Feb 5, 03:39 PST
Monitoring - Functionality has been restored for all customers. We are continuing to monitor app performance.

Feb 5, 03:02 PST
Identified - Vanta engineers have identified the issue and are working to implement a fix.
We are monitoring the behaviour and will continue to provide updates as they become available.

Feb 5, 01:07 PST
Investigating - We have identified an issue the is preventing Questionnaire Automation from loading affecting all customers.

We have also identified an issue preventing Trust Centers from loading for public and admin users, affecting some customers.

Our team is investigating the root cause and will provide an update as soon as possible.

item.title: "Items requiring your attention" emails have incorrect numbers for tests that need attention
item.content:encoded:
Jan 31, 16:36 PST
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Jan 31, 16:31 PST
Update - A fix has been implemented and the issue has been resolved

Jan 31, 07:58 PST
Identified - We have identified an issue where the "items requiring your attention” emails sent yesterday and today had incorrect numbers for tests that need attention. This issue is impacting all customers.

Our team had identified the root cause and is working on a fix. We will provide an update as soon as possible.

item.title: The Vanta Agent is currently experiencing issues registering to domains.
item.content:encoded:
Jan 31, 12:23 PST
Resolved - This incident has been resolved, as a result:

- Employees can now install the Vanta Agent again
- macOS installations will no longer fail
- For Windows, if the device is still not showing up, they'll need to re-install
- Reach out to support@vanta.com for additional help

Jan 31, 07:55 PST
Identified - The issue has been identified and a fix is being implemented.

item.title: Links to the Trust Center from Vendor Profile leads to incorrect page for EU accounts
item.content:encoded:
Jan 30, 12:54 PST
Resolved - A fix has been implemented and the issue has been resolved

Jan 30, 10:57 PST
Identified - We have identified an issue where the links to Trust Centers from within the Vendor Risk Management table are directed to incorrect pages for EU customers. The team is working on a fix and will provide updates when available.

item.title: Vanta Agent Download Link is Down
item.content:encoded:
Jan 29, 08:42 PST
Resolved - This incident has been resolved, and users should be able to download the agent again.

Jan 29, 08:06 PST
Investigating - We have identified an issue causing https://app.vanta.com/osquery/download/macOS and https://app.vanta.com/osquery/download/windows to be down. Users are currently unable to download the Vanta Agent. Our team is investigating the root cause and will provide an update as soon as possible.

item.title: Temporary Outage
item.content:encoded:
Jan 24, 09:32 PST
Resolved - We identified a temporary Vanta outage that affected all customers for approximately 5 minutes. This issue has since been resolved and Vanta should now be operational again.

Jan 24, 09:27 PST
Investigating - We identified a temporary Vanta outage that affected all customers for approximately 5 minutes. This issue has since been resolved and Vanta should now be operational again.

item.title: Temporary Outage
item.content:encoded:
Jan 24, 09:30 PST
Resolved - We identified a temporary Vanta outage that affected all customers for approximately 5 minutes. This issue has since been resolved and Vanta should now be operational again.

item.title: Delay in Agent Data syncing
item.content:encoded:
Jan 16, 17:18 PST
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Jan 16, 13:55 PST
Monitoring - Vanta Agent data syncing has improved to normal levels, we are currently monitoring the results.

Jan 16, 12:24 PST
Identified - We have currently identified and are working on resolving an issue surrounding a delay in Vanta Agent data syncing.

item.title: Issues loading the People and Groups pages
item.content:encoded:
Jan 12, 13:41 PST
Resolved - The issue has been resolved, the people and groups pages should now be loading normally again.

Jan 12, 12:18 PST
Identified - There is currently an issue with loading the peoples and groups pages within Vanta. The issue has been identified and we are working on a fix.

item.title: Questionnaire Automation and Trustpage Trust Centers failing to load for logged-in users
item.content:encoded:
Dec 21, 04:11 PST
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Dec 21, 02:59 PST
Identified - We're working closely with an upstream provider to resolve this issue.

Dec 21, 02:03 PST
Investigating - We're investigating an issue where Questionnaire Automation and Trustpage Trust Centers are failing to load.

item.title: Some users received duplicate email notifications
item.content:encoded:
Dec 12, 10:07 PST
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Dec 12, 08:44 PST
Identified - We have identified an issue where some users may have received duplicate email notifications, affecting both admins and employees in Vanta.

Our team has identified the issue and is applying a fix, notifications should resume working as expected later today.

item.title: Questionnaire Automation and Trustpage Trust Centers failing to load for logged-in users
item.content:encoded:
Dec 8, 20:35 PST
Resolved - We've seen consistently restored functionality for the past 5 minutes for both Trust Center and Questionnaire Automation. Thanks for your patience as we worked through this with our downstream provider. Details below.

At approximately 00:20 UTC we began noticing failed requests in our backend applications. Investigation revealed the failures were happening with an upstream data provider. After opening a support ticket with the provider their support team was able to identify and mitigate the issue.

Dec 8, 20:24 PST
Monitoring - A fix has been implemented in our downstream provider and we're continuing to monitor as functionality is restored.

Dec 8, 19:51 PST
Update - We've made infrastructure adjustments that should help mitigate some of the failures customers are seeing, and are actively working with our downstream provider to resolve the root issue.

Dec 8, 18:51 PST
Update - We're continuing to investigate alternative mitigation options while we wait for further updates from our downstream provider. Pages are loading occasionally but still fail the majority of the time.

Dec 8, 18:04 PST
Identified - We've confirmed an issue with our downstream provider and are assisting their support team. We're also exploring other mitigation options.

Dec 8, 17:39 PST
Update - We've narrowed down the issue to one of our downstream providers and are working with their support team to identify and resolve the issue.

Dec 8, 17:23 PST
Investigating - We're investigating an issue where Questionnaire Automation and Trustpage Trust Centers are failing to load.

item.title: Jumpcloud Screenlock Tests Failing
item.content:encoded:
Dec 1, 18:22 PST
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Dec 1, 13:46 PST
Identified - We've identified a root cause, and are working on a fix.

Dec 1, 12:42 PST
Investigating - We are currently investigating an issue causing Jumpcloud-monitored devices to fail the Screenlock check.

item.title: Trust Centers failing to load intermittently
item.content:encoded:
Dec 1, 08:01 PST
Resolved - Fix has been implemented

Dec 1, 07:30 PST
Identified - Some customers may see error pages due to cached values in their custom domain Trust Center. A fix is being deployed.
Refreshing the page should resolve the issue until the fix is released.

item.title: Trustpage Trust Center and Questionnaire Automation resources page not loading
item.content:encoded:
Nov 27, 17:20 PST
Resolved - This issue has now been resolved.

Nov 27, 16:50 PST
Investigating - We are currently investigating an issue where the Resources page and Questionnaire Automation on Trustpage Trust Centers are failing to load.

item.title: Duplicate Checklists and Groups appearing for some customers
item.content:encoded:
Nov 17, 10:00 PST
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Nov 16, 15:08 PST
Identified - The issue has been identified and a fix is being implemented.

Nov 16, 12:37 PST
Investigating - Some customers are seeing duplicate checklists and groups. We are working to mitigate this issue.

item.title: GCP integration showing no resources
item.content:encoded:
Nov 15, 10:00 PST
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Nov 14, 13:42 PST
Monitoring - Customers that have connected GCP via an organization may see an issue where resources are not appearing in Vanta. We have deployed a fix but it may take up to 24 hours for resources to appear in Vanta again.
